subject: Meeting we have yesterday with
body:
Meeting we have yesterday with the World Bank and North Ridge Trust Bank your Two Million,Five Hundred Thousand Dollars ($2,500,000.000) will be paid to you in a Cash delivery direct to your doorstep, 
you are to reconfirm your full information once again to enable us proceed with the delivery today.
1.Home Address.
2.Telephone Number .
3.Age and Marital Status.
4.Occupation.
5.Payment method.
Yours in Service
Mr. Simon Stiell
Executive Secretary,
United Nation (UNFCCC)

subject: Re: Meeting we have yesterday with
body:
Hello Mr. Simon Stiell,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. I must say, it sounds quite intriguing. Could you please provide me with more details about the meeting with the World Bank and North Ridge Trust Bank? I would like to understand how my Two Hundred Thousand Dollars will be delivered to my doorstep in cash.

Before I proceed, may I ask why you need me to reconfirm my full address, phone number, and marital status? Is there a specific reason for this information?

I appreciate your assistance and look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Carrie
